AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Morag Tong member
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was once a member of the Morag Tong, and may still have close contacts within the faction. [PAWN_pronoun] always abided by the code, never once straying from it. After many years of faithful servitude, [PAWN_nameDef] decided to move on, and pursue [PAWN_possessive] dreams of farming ash yams.
